tracks.text: In front of the Regina Tourism Board, Jimmy gets into a car while Cookie drives.
Typed text, RCMP Special Agent Strait McCool
Gina breaks a bottle on Petey's head
Petey falls to the floor, bleeding out
Jimmy steps over Petey
At Tommy Chong Cigar Bar
She stomps on his phone
The streams freeze in mid air
He looks at the empty driveway
Jimmy walks down a snowy suburban sidewalk, carrying a napsack
Jimmy approaches the house. His key doesn't work. He squints at the lock, which reads Angry Wife Lock Company.
He covers his face, and peaks between his fingers
Pile of clothes
Lands on him
It pokes him in the eye
At the Regina Tourism Bureau
At a diner
Shwa rolls dice at a craps table in McCool's living room.
Wheaton uses a neuralyzer
McCool enters
It crashes behind McCool
McCool walks down a snowy suburban sidewalk, carrying a napsack
Petey's tongue is stuck to a lamppost
Gangster Land
Gina draws with lipstick
Hangman game spelling T H blank R blank S A
Theresa leaps on Gina, and they roll around. Gina holds the dagger over Theresa, then Theresa pulls Gina's hair, then they slap hands. McCool separates them
Picture of Gina strangling Theresa with a rainbow while she's stabbed by a unicorn Gina is riding
Gina's head explodes.
At McCool's cabin, a crowd holds money while watching Cheech fight a bear.
The bear kicks Cheech in the balls, tosses him in the air, throws him on the ground, and grabs a leg
At the house, McCool folds underwear
Wheaton fiddles with a remote labelled Robot Remote 1200
Rosalie sparks
Rosalie holds out her hands and pursues Jimmy and Cookie into the street.
Wheaton leaps on Rosalie. They land in the street and explode in a mushroom cloud.
They kiss in front of the mushroom cloud in a street of green smoke
